content: the cloud hat shown in the lamb & kid big birdie & the lamb & kid fletcher aran the cloud hat by the lamb & kid the cloud hat is a staple pattern here at the lamb & kid knit bottom up in the round this hat features a ribbed brim that is folded over when worn our original version was designed in the lamb & kid big birdie which creates a fluffy and feminine cloud-like fabric hence the name version 2 of the cloud hat includes an additional size for your littlest family and friends which we knit in our fletcher aran base a non-superwash organic merino that suits the whole family materials
